properties.Description: Properties for Disk pool create request.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives.

systemData.Description: Resource metadata required by ARM RPC

availabilityZones.Description: Logical zone for Disk pool resource; example: ["1"].

disks.Description: List of Azure Managed Disks to attach to a Disk pool. Can attach 8 disks at most.

subnetId.Description: Azure Resource ID of a Subnet for the Disk pool.

additionalCapabilities.Description: List of additional capabilities for a Disk pool.

tier.Description: Determines the SKU of VM deployed for Disk pool

provisioningState.Description: State of the operation on the resource.

status.Description: Operational status of the Disk pool.

id.Description: Unique Azure Resource ID of the Managed Disk.

createdBy.Description: A string identifier for the identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource: user, application, managedIdentity.

lastModifiedBy.Description: A string identifier for the identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource: user, application, managedIdentity.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC).

properties.Description: Properties for iSCSI target create request.

tpgs.Description: List of iSCSI target portal groups. Can have 1 portal group at most.

targetIqn.Description: iSCSI target IQN (iSCSI Qualified Name); example: "iqn.2005-03.org.iscsi:server".

provisioningState.Description: State of the operation on the resource.

status.Description: Operational status of the iSCSI target.

luns.Description: List of LUNs to be exposed through the iSCSI target portal group.

acls.Description: Access Control List (ACL) for an iSCSI target portal group.

attributes.Description: Attributes of an iSCSI target portal group.

endpoints.Description: List of private IPv4 addresses to connect to the iSCSI target.

tag.Description: The tag associated with the iSCSI target portal group.

port.Description: The port used by iSCSI target portal group.

name.Description: User defined name for iSCSI LUN; example: "lun0"

managedDiskAzureResourceId.Description: Azure Resource ID of the Managed Disk.

initiatorIqn.Description: iSCSI initiator IQN (iSCSI Qualified Name); example: "iqn.2005-03.org.iscsi:client".

mappedLuns.Description: List of LUN names mapped to the ACL.

credentials.Description: Challenge Handshake Authentication Protocol (CHAP) credentials to set for the ACL. Credentials can not be updated for an ACL.

username.Description: Username for Challenge Handshake Authentication Protocol (CHAP) authentication.

password.Description: Password for Challenge Handshake Authentication Protocol (CHAP) authentication.

authentication.Description: Indicates whether or not authentication is enabled on the ACL.

prodModeWriteProtect.Description: Indicates whether or not write protect is enabled on the LUNs.
